scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:debug: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node --inspect-brk -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register node_modules/.bin/jest --runInBand
scripts.db:generate: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm -- migration:generate -d src/config/typeorm.config.ts
scripts.db:migrate: cross-env NODE_ENV=$NODE_ENV ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:run -d src/config/typeorm.config.ts
scripts.db:revert: cross-env NODE_ENV=$NODE_ENV ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:revert -d src/config/typeorm.config.ts
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:fresh: npm run db:revert && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.dev:setup: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build && npm run db:create && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.dev:reset: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build && npm run db:fresh
scripts.dev:clean: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build && npm run db:revert
scripts.test:setup: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run build && npm run db:create:test && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run db:migrate
scripts.test:reset: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run build && npm run db:revert && npm run db:migrate
scripts.staging:setup: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging npm run build && npm run db:migrate
scripts.staging:reset: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging npm run build && npm run db:fresh
